item.description:
OK- it will be hot Sat so I moved up the time, and changed the place to something more local and shorter than the East Bay RI path. We will ride East to the end, then back to Bedford, before returning to the starting point for lunch. We will be going at a slow to moderate pace. I believe this is about 20 miles.

There is a pay parking lot behind the restaurant with very low rates. ($.50/hour)
item.how_to_find_us: Meet on Bike Path behind Bertucci's on Mass Ave
item.name: Minuteman bike trail
